alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Jones; Monroe; Morgan; Newton; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, western Putnam, northern Monroe, eastern Butts, northwestern Jones, Jasper and southeastern Newton Counties through 745 PM EST ... At 700 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Starrsville to near Blount, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Monticello, Newborn, Flovilla, Mansfield, Shady Dale, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Berner, Godfrey, Willard, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Calvin, Farrar, Blount, Eudora, Hillsboro, North Alcovy, McElheneys Crossroads, and Stanfordville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Jasper; Jones; Monroe; Morgan; Newton; Putnam
